resources.string: "Touch this box to gather randomness: %1$d%% done"
"In order to assure randomness during the key generation, move your finger randomly over the box below."
"Enter a passphrase to encrypt the exported key"
"A key with this nickname already exists"
"IT IS POSSIBLE THAT SOMEONE IS DOING SOMETHING NASTY!"\n"Someone could be eavesdropping on you right now (man-in-the-middle attack)!"\n"It is also possible that the host key has just been changed."
"Are you sure you want to continue connecting?"
"The authenticity of host '%1$s' can't be established."
"Size of scrollback buffer to keep in memory for each console"
"Add a font from Google Fonts by name"
"Import a font file from storage (TTF, OTF)"
Keep back-ups of the private keys using Android\'s backup mechanism
"Tap console to show title bar and access menu"
"Swipe the left third of the screen to send pg up/dn to the terminal"
"On hardware keyboards, number keys send F1-F10 with shift"
"On software keyboards, number keys send F1-F10 with ctrl"
"Font size can also be changed in profile settings"
"Keep unlocked keys in memory until backend service is terminated"
"Force connections to stay connected while in background"
"Prevent the screen from turning off when working in a console"
"Prevent Wi-Fi from turning off when a session is active"
"Vibrate when sending arrow keys; useful for laggy connections"
"Send notification when a terminal running in the background sounds a bell."
"Commands to run on remote server once authenticated"
"Disable this preference to only use port forwards"
"Try to reconnect to host if disconnected"
"Close immediately after remote disconnect without prompting."
Select a profile to use its terminal settings
Force the terminal to a specific size (columns x rows) instead of auto-sizing to fit the screen.
No profiles yet. Tap + to create one.
Are you sure you want to delete \'%s\'?
"Are you sure you want to delete '%1$s'?"
"Are you sure you want to disconnect from all connected hosts?"
"Attempting 'publickey' authentication with any in-memory public keys"
"Selected public key is invalid, try reselecting key in host editor"
"Attempting 'publickey' authentication with a specific public key"
"Session will not be started due to host preference."
"Failure! Local shell is unavailable on this phone."
"Are you sure you want to delete \"%1$s\"? This action cannot be undone."
"No custom schemes. Tap \"New Scheme\" to create one."
"This will reset all 256 colors to their default values. This action cannot be undone."
Enter text to send to terminal
Failed to load port forwards for %1$s: %2$s
No URLs found in terminal buffer
Encrypted keys cannot be unlocked at startup
Protect this key with your fingerprint
No fingerprint enrolled. Set up fingerprint in device settings to use this feature.
Fingerprint protection is only available for RSA and EC keys
Touch the fingerprint sensor to unlock \'%1$s\'
Displaying a notification is required keep connections alive in the background. Without permission, connections may close when you switch apps.
To keep connections alive in the background, you must enable notification permission in app settings.
Are you trying to access a local host? Grant local network permissions.
Please do not close the app during migration
An error occurred during database migration: %s
If the problem persists, please report this issue at %1$s with the debug log copied above
Are you sure you want to disconnect from \'%1$s\'?
Are you sure you want to delete host \'%1$s\'?
Are you sure you want to forget the stored host keys for \'%1$s\'? You will be prompted to verify the host key on the next connection.
Failed to connect to jump host %1$s: %2$s
Jump host not found in saved hosts
To report a bug, copy these logs and open a new issue at https://connectbot.org/bug

A clean and comfortable dark theme
